item.description: ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’è¿”ã™æ™‚ã§ã‚‚ãƒªãƒˆãƒ©ã‚¤ã•ã›ãŸããªã„å ´åˆã¯ã€ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ã«X-Slack-No-Retryã‚’æŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹ã€‚ func handler(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) { // Process something... // Set "X-Slack-No-Retry: 1" if prevent retry. w.Header().Set("X-Slack-No-Retry", "1") w.Header().Set("Content-Type", "application/json") w.WriteHeader(http.StatusBadRequest) w.Write([]byte("")) } Reference https://api.slack.com/events-api#the-events-api__field-guide__error-handling__graceful-retries__turning-retries-off
